retrieve

public java.sql.ResultSet retrieve(java.lang.String query)
Execute query and retrieve results. Note, this should only be used for internal and sanitized parameters. Else use the version that takes parameters as a separate argument to prevent SQL injection attacks.

Parameters:
query - The query to execute.
Returns:
The retrieved result set. May be null.
See Also:
retrieve(String query, Object[] params)

retrieve

public java.sql.ResultSet retrieve(java.lang.String query,
                                   java.lang.Object[] params)
Execute query and retrieve results.

Parameters:
query - The query to execute.
params - The query parameters to use.
Returns:
The retrieved result set. May be null.

update
